items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame should push the 10 wins in a row button
items.summary: Joshua, Jude, and Brendan are back in the fold to talk about the Notre Dame football program — which is currently 0-2 and ranked #24 in the nation. items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Purdue Boilermakers
items.summary: Well, well, well… it’s come to this. Notre Dame’s 0-2 start to the season has made the game against the Purdue Boilermakers kind of a big one. What a wild world we’re living in. Notre Dame has some very obvious issues on the defensive side of the football. Just to name a few. Even though […]

items.title: Notre Dame’s Leprecat isn’t going anywhere
items.summary: At some point in the Charlie Weis era at Notre Dame, the wildcat formation became a very popular trend throughout college football. After Brady Quinn and Darius Walker left Notre Dame for the NFL following the 2006 season, the Irish ran into all sorts of offensive issues which resulted in their use of the wildcat… […]

items.title: Can Notre Dame win the rest of its 10 regular season games?
items.summary: Welcome to SB Nation Reacts, a survey of fans across the NCAA. Throughout the year we ask questions of the most plugged-in Notre Dame fans and fans across the country. Sign up here to participate in the weekly emailed surveys. I can’t say that Notre Dame starting the season with an 0-2 record was unthinkable. […]

items.title: Three Things We Saw in Notre Dame’s Loss to Texas A&M
items.summary: Jim Mora Energy Another week meant another close loss for Notre Dame football in 2025 – this time against a fast and physical, but also flawed and beatable, Texas A&M football team at home. A lot of talk in the national media has centered on what this loss means for Notre Dame’s ambition to make […]
